Name: Fadó: Chapter One
About the game: Fadó is an episodic indie RPG, rooted in Irish mythology. The first chapter introduces four story routes, each focusing on different characters, places, and events from Celtic myth. You'll also... - Play as four iconic heroes across each of the four story routes: Cú Chulainn, Fionn Mac Cumhaill, Saint Brigid and Saint Patrick - Explore a fantastical hand-drawn ancient Ireland - Come face-to-face with legendary allies and otherworldly enemies in lively turn-based battles - Experience an evocative original soundtrack by Georgia Lynch, Peter Kelly and Fionn Keeley Additional tags - Fado: Chapter One
Meta Title: Fadó: Chapter One: Oct 21, 2019, Fionn Keeley and Full Ov...
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fadó: Chapter One? Check out the release date (Oct 21, 2019), developer insights from Fionn Keeley, and a complete game summary.
